scheme_name: Provision of Sports Kits to Players Participating at the National Level
brief_description: This scheme provides a sports kit worth ₹5000/- (including tracksuit, jersey, shorts, socks, etc.) to approximately 1000 players annually who participate in various sports at the national level, selected through their respective sports federations.
detailed_description: The &quot;Provision of Sports Kits to Players Participating at the National Level&quot; scheme implemented by the Department of Sports, Uttarakhand, is designed to support athletes representing the state in various sports disciplines at the national level. Under this scheme, players/members of teams participating in different age groups at national-level competitions receive a comprehensive sports kit. Each kit, valued at ₹5000/-, typically includes items such as a tracksuit, jersey, shorts, socks, and other essential gear. The selection of these teams for national-level participation is carried out by the concerned sports federations. Approximately 1000 players are expected to benefit from this provision each year.
benefits: Sports Kit Distribution: A sports kit worth ₹5,000/-, containing items such as a tracksuit, jersey, shorts, socks, and shoes.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant must be a player or member of a team. The applicant's team must be participating at the national level.

steps: Team Selection: Teams participating at the national level are selected by their respective sports federations. Submission: The application is submitted to the relevant sports federation. Provision of Kit: Upon approval of the application, the sports kit is provided to the player.

documents_required: Proof of being a selected player/member of a team participating at the national level. Identity proof. Proof of participation in the national-level event (e.g., selection letter, event details). Any other documents as required.
